agent_state.description: Current state of the agent (e.g., available, away).

available_time.description: Total time the agent is available for calls.

avatar_url.description: URL to the agent's avatar image.

away_time.description: Total time the agent is marked as away.

call_status.description: Status of current call (e.g., ongoing, ended).

calls_accepted.description: Total number of calls accepted by the agent.

calls_denied.description: Total number of calls denied by the agent.

calls_missed.description: Total number of calls missed by the agent.

forwarding_number.description: Phone number calls are forwarded to.

online_time.description: Total time the agent is online and active.

total_call_duration.description: Total duration of all calls handled by the agent.

total_talk_time.description: Total duration of talk time for all calls handled by the agent.

total_wrap_up_time.description: Total time taken to wrap up calls after ending for the agent.

via.description: Platform or channel via which calls are received (e.g., phone, chat).

accepted_third_party_conferences.description: Number of third-party conferences accepted by the agent.

accepted_transfers.description: Number of transfers accepted by the agent.

average_hold_time.description: Average time calls are put on hold before being resumed.

average_talk_time.description: Average duration of talk time for calls.

average_wrap_up_time.description: Average time taken to wrap up a call after ending.

calls_put_on_hold.description: Total number of calls put on hold by the agent.

started_third_party_conferences.description: Number of third-party conferences initiated by the agent.

started_transfers.description: Number of transfers initiated by the agent.

total_hold_time.description: Total time calls are put on hold by the agent.
